text: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Hwan ne ͻsoro ne asaase Wura?” Kasε: “Onyankopͻn”. Kasε: “Enti mofri N’akyi fa akyitaafoͻ a wͻ’ntumi mfa mfasoͻ anaasε ͻhaw biara mma wͻn ho?” Kasε: “Enti onifirani ne obia ohunu adeε yεpε? Anaasε enti esum ne εhyεn yε pε? Anaasε wͻ’de mmatahoo a wa’bͻ (biribi) sεdeε Nyankopͻn abͻ no na abata Nyankopͻn ho a εnam saa nti ama abͻdeε no asε ama wͻn anaa?” Kasε: ”Onyankopͻn na Ɔyԑ biribiara Bᴐfo, na Ɔne Opumpuni Baako no a Ɔkorͻn wͻ biribiara soͻ no “
